titles.title: To designate September 14, 1994, as "Mercy Otis Warren Day".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1443)
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 7/12/1994--Introduced. Designates September 14, 1994, as Mercy Otis Warren Day.
